about_the_game:
Hotel Simulator is all about managing and improving your business. You are free to run and decorate the hotel as you wish

Operate

Have you ever wanted to run your own hotel? Now you have the chance! You start with nothing but a few rooms and a reception desk. Customer service is the key to success. Let your guests feel at home. Everyone also expects their rooms to be clean, key given and room service right away. You'll have to juggle your responsibilities well to keep up with demand.

Expand

You don't have to stay small forever. You can expand your hotel to host more customers. Expand your rooms, increase their standard, hire more employees. Remember that a hotel is not just a place to sleep. Prepare additional attractions for your guests! Spa, swimming pool, saunas, game room with dart and billiards. Raise the standard of your hotel.
Fight for reviews
Fight for positive customer reviews on booking portals, remember that they matter for the number of hotel customers. The better the reviews, the more customers and the more money you make.
Solve guests' problems
Someone needs an ironing board, someone wants to order an alarm clock, and someone else needs a cab. Make sure your guests have what they need.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i3-7100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Hotel Simulator is your chance to start a new life as a hotel owner! Keep up with you clients demands by renovating, cleaning and upgrading.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
